name: Color Shooter (LordPolander)
description:
its simple, aim and shoot the right target (look at the enviroment / your gun)

share your highscore, if you find any bugs please tell me about them in the comments below.

(music comming in next update)

This game is still under development, the first 2 rounds might be buggy and shots may not register, its adviced tofire blindly for the first 2 rounds for the assets to load (I will make the next version more compact to guarantee faster loading next update )
